dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents areas of land use in Baghdad, Iraq, including agriculture, transportation, parks, health services, buildings, and cemeteries. This layer is part of a collection of 2010 routing data for Baghdad. This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. LeadDog Consulting. (2010). Land Use, Baghdad, 2010. LeadDog Consulting. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/ny901kq8457.

stanford_use_and_reproduction_s:
These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates for Academic Use only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff, 
and students. Academic use includes the ability to publish maps and other results from the data in academic/research journals with proper source referencing to the data originator. These data may not be used for any commercial purpose whatsoever without specific written agreement from the copyright holder. For more information please contact brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
